roleset.name: to fall, drop
roleset.note: FLOP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flop' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from flop.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: A U.S.-made imitation under the title `` Almost Anything Goes '' flopped fast .
example.arg: A U.S.-made imitation under the title `` Almost Anything Goes ''
